website_summaries.verdict: A stylish option if you're looking for a toothbrush holder with a little more ornamental appeal.
pros: Beautifully designed with a divided ceramic cup and bronze coated metal holder
Cup is easy to remove for rinsing
Other matching accessories in the collection are available
cons: Pretty, but it doesn't hold much
No drainage means it requires frequent rinsing to keep clean

customer_reviews.title: Simply Elegant
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this purchase! So much so that I purchased 2 more for my other rooms. This is so simple, yet elegant. It is a beautiful neutral color cream with bronze accents. It's larger than many soap dispensers so I won't have to fill it as often. It's sits very sturdy in the holder - the quality is excellent. The pumping action gives you just the right amount of soap. I absolutely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: FlyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what our bathroom needed
customer_reviews.text: The product looks very classy. Bottles are made of ceramic and the holders of metal with very tasteful details. Needless to say the pump spring assembly looks sturdy. Hopefully will last a long time. I ordered two to use as soap and lotion dispensers as these are perfect match for the color theme of our bathroom. Can easily hold 12 oz of liquid. Could not be happier with the purchase. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Vanilla/Bronze InterDesign Twigz Bath, Facial Tissue Box Cover/Holder
customer_reviews.text: This tissue box cover was perfect for my desk. It lends a polished, professional look to my tissues. I am not a fan of the tissue boxes that are more geared to grade school, but when buying a multipack of tissues, you sometimes get some that aren't great. This cover is exactly what I needed. Love it and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Love this design
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of this with the holder, but as others have noted the pump does drip. I use it for body oil and I have learned to keep my hand there to catch the second or third drip so it doesn't go onto the counter. I am not sure if it is used for a thicker hand soap if it will drip less? I still love it and not too awful to have to keep my hand there an extra second or two. Would have rated five stars if it wasn't for that, but I can handle dealing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Boatnone

customer_reviews.title: No mess! Update Feb 2017
customer_reviews.text: Before I had this soap dish, I had no soap dish. We left our bar soap right on top of the sink counter, which created a wet, soapy mess. I finally purchased this soap dish and it's been great. It keeps any soapy mess inside. It's easy to clean, stays in place and it looks great. I have no complaints. I will update my review if any problems arise. Update Feb 2017: It finally broke and rusted, so I threw it away. According to Amazon, I bought this 4 years old. I guess that's not so bad, right? It lasted a few years.
customer_reviews.author: World's Okayest Mom

customer_reviews.title: Update:Good
customer_reviews.text: A luxurious addition to the bathroom. The only pitfall is that the big hole which is supposed to take toothpaste tube is not big enough to take the common size tubes. Update 9-26-18: after almost 2 yrs of having them they started to rust and peel off. They should be designed for bathroom use in the most humid condition however they did not live long. I had to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Ahlam

customer_reviews.title: Had so much potential
customer_reviews.text: This had so much potential but sadly, poor construction resulted in the pump becoming non-functional in less than 2 months of usage. As with so many products made today this just had shoddy workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: AWagoner

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty tissue holder, wish the color matched the soap dispenser. Soap dispenser is glass,the tissue box is plastic. It is a noticeable difference, so I had to keep them st opposite ends of the counter 2 weeks later...so nice, I bought more for the other bathroom and a tissue box for the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Add a touch of elegance to your bathroom counter.
customer_reviews.text: These are quite lovely. Very sturdy and function well also. I bought one for each of my bathrooms and the decor in each is different but these still fit right in. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Really Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I've never before felt quite so excited by a toothbrush holder as I was when this arrived! The picture doesn't do it justice -- this is even prettier when you see it in person! The holder is good quality and doesn't break when you drop it (as I can personally vouch for . . . twice). If you use a larger handled toothbrush, however, do be aware that it won't fit in the smaller holes. I discovered that when I switched toothbrush brands, but I don't mind since I can just store it in the hole meant to hold the toothpaste.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a toothbrush holder for two that also held the tube of toothpaste. Bingo; this is it and stylish too. The very minor downside is the opening for the tube of toothpaste isn't quite large enough to accommodate the largest size tube of toothpaste. Actually the upper half of the large tube fits fine, it's the wide flat bottom of the tube that's slightly too wide. Since we still have 3 large tubes of toothpaste to use up, I simply fold the bottom sides in and crease them until they stay in place. Will buy the next tube size down next time though.
customer_reviews.author: One Person's Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Everything that I expected + some.
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect. Just like it is and shown and described in the listing picture and description. I have eggshell walls in the bathroom and this fits in perfectly. I love the fact that the soap dish itself is really ceramic and not plastic as in some cheaper designs of this soap dish. The ceramic dish is a sort of beige creme and is very pleasing to the eye. Glad I purchased it, and the price is right. I have both the soap dish and the tumbler and both have ceramic inserts. Looks really good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: it would be fine. Or if you only have one (two max) ...
customer_reviews.text: It's really cute. My only complaint was it was a little small. A regular size tooth brush fits in the smaller hole, but not an electric one. Also, if I put the electric tooth brush in the big hole, the toothpaste has to be crammed in. If you use regular tooth brushes, it would be fine. Or if you only have one (two max) electric tooth brush, then it would also be fine. Otherwise, it's a bit too small. The material seems well made, and it looks cute on my sink.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Buy if your toothbrush is thin
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars only because of the size, the toothpaste hardly can be put inside. In rest the design is beautiful and nice
customer_reviews.author: Assel

customer_reviews.title: It holds toothbrushes! (and a tube of toothpaste also!)
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's a toothbrush holder. It holds toothbrushes. And it's good at its job. It looks good also. It will not however hold the spin brushes (the 5 - 7 dollar models) in the toothbrush portion. The hole is simply to small. They will fit in the area designed for toothpaste. With that said. I have no complaints. It looks good in the master bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: A. Outlaw

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Love them. They look great. 1 showed up without the pump. Replacement showed up the same. 3rd time will say if these are mostly this way or just an issue with the warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: David R Goos

customer_reviews.title: It looks just like the photo
customer_reviews.text: It has a decent appearance on my counter. The decorative metal "cage" over the plastic seems a bit oversized. I probably would not have bought it if I had seen it first. It looks just like the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Joyful One

customer_reviews.title: Buy this with the soap dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with the soap dispenser and it's a great set. I use this in the kitchen and I took out the ceramic soap holder and put my sponge in the metal base. Sponge dries out perfectly and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Mary

customer_reviews.title: Nice substitute for store bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty and much nicer than the store bottle sitting on the counter. We used to keep it under the sink, but since we’ve had this pretty bottle it looks nice on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: The metal scroll design very nice.............
customer_reviews.text: 5/30/19 Prompt delivery, great packaging I received the soap dish today it is beautiful. Order you won't be disappointed. M.H.
customer_reviews.author: M.H.

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like picture
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I got it for the kitchen sink for dispensing dish liquid. It looks great and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dawg

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking in comparison
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the toothbrush holder and toilet paper bin that came in this set, however the tissue box is very cheap in comparison. Ceramic toothbrush holder definitely holds a big edge over the cheap looking cream plastic box. A little disappointed, I would think the set would have more cohesion. Makes me too nervous to order other things in this collection.
customer_reviews.author: A. Blakely

customer_reviews.title: If not packaged probably may come broken but otherwise amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I got this and the soap dispenser. The first time it came it was broken because the box it came in was too big and had other stuff in it, but Amazon was very quick with the replacement :) I love these! They’re very stylish and go great with my bathroom decor
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Great style
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it fits into my existing decor. It's not white, but an off white or almond.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna B

customer_reviews.title: Pretty soak dish
customer_reviews.text: I really love this soap dish. It's very pretty and is easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Clow

customer_reviews.title: The holes in this BEAUTIFUL toothbrush holder are very small so if you have ...
customer_reviews.text: The holes in this BEAUTIFUL toothbrush holder are very small so if you have a fat or wide toothbrush, it will not fit in the 2 smaller slots. I was only able to fit 1 of our toothbrushes in this but I still think it was a great deal for the price and quality of the item. Would work if you have a standard sized toothbrush and not one with a rubber/gel gripper on the handle. Item came well packaged and in perfect condition. Just as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: poo

customer_reviews.title: The tissue box is the best product in this line
customer_reviews.text: I love this whole line, but the tissue box is my favorite product from it. I can pull the tissues out of the box one-handed, and suddenly my tissue box is adding to my decor instead of detracting from it.
customer_reviews.author: lapez8

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the soap dish back in November. I am extremely pleased with this product! It is elegant and fits beautifully in with my bathroom decor. It is durable and does not scratch the surface that is rests on. I would recommend getting this item.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Randazzo

customer_reviews.title: Too Big
customer_reviews.text: U returned it because outside cage piece was too big.
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Sweet toothbrush/paste holder
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for out tooth brushes and tooth past. We have larger handle tooth brushes that would fit in our bathroom holder on the wall. This nice looking unit was the perfect answer. We are able to store the two tooth brushes and paste in this holder upright and it looks really sweet. A perfect Christmas gift or a way to organize your own bath room.
customer_reviews.author: Frank H.

customer_reviews.title: We Like It.
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and the size of this toothbrush holder. It looks great in our bathroom. The only downside is that if you get a toothbrush with a thicker handle, like my husband has for his big hands, then, the toothbrush doesn't fit into either of the 2 smaller holes. If your toothbrush has a circumference greater than 5.5cm, then, your toothbrush won't fit properly into the smaller holes.
customer_reviews.author: Goldmoons Tavern

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. Just received it today, so not sure of how it will hold up. But, love it right now. Looks nice in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Alden

customer_reviews.title: Nice but could be better....
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice piece. I used it in my bathroom. I would have given it more stars had it not been bent in several places and not been uneven on the bottom. Also it does not some with any skid feet so it slides on hard surfaces. I purchased some skid stop feet for it and made it work, but I would have been happier if what you pull out of the box just worked without having to rig it.
customer_reviews.author: Goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 2 of these. One arrived in crumbles. ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of these. One arrived in crumbles. Also , as stated by other reviews our toothbrushes did not fit so I was warned and cannot complain about that. Had to return for above reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but broken
customer_reviews.text: This toothbrush holder is very pretty but is breaks VERY easily. Mine actually arrived cracked. Also the slots are small and will not hold anything bigger than a standard toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: S. D. Huddleston

customer_reviews.title: Nice without being expensive
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice looking Very functional Holds 2 toothbrushes easily...could possibly put in a third, if it is 2 children size and 1 adult despite other reviews, it holds our toothpaste nicely we use Toms of Maine ...its a regular to a touch bigger size toothpaste ... Buy it and if you do not like it as we do , Amazon is great at returns , so you can not lose
customer_reviews.author: Candace Mike N Elmo

customer_reviews.title: not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: For the cost of this product, it is not made well. The holes are so small they cannot even contain your toothpaste or your floss. The ceramic portion of the product broke on me. It was NOT the fault of the company. I am now using the metal portion and it, at least, holds my toothbrushes, toothpaste and floss.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Carole

customer_reviews.title: The design and color is great but unless you buy a smaller or thinner toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: The design and color is great but unless you buy a smaller or thinner toothpaste, you have to really force others into the hole. Be careful with the outer design/holder as it can scratch your countertop or sink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Matches my Granite perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't buy this product because it said: "Includes clear, removable insert". What in the heck does that mean? I was afraid the soap dish might be plastic or have some weird insert, but I took a chance anyway. The soap dish itself is heavy ceramic, in a beautiful cream color, just what I was hoping for. And the metal outside is nice quality. Very delighted with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Katerri22

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous...exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product and well made. Using this soap dish in my new bathroom and it complements the décor perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra A LaValley

customer_reviews.title: Great Design
customer_reviews.text: It was light weight and the colour matches any decor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but the functionality has flaws
customer_reviews.text: I like the dispenser it is very nice looking. It is disappointing with how long it has lasted us though, we have had it for about a year the the part where the soap comes out of pops off. We have seasonal soap dispensers too so it isn't like a solid year of use.
customer_reviews.author: S. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I'd hoped it would do and that is keep the tube of toothpaste out of the way and off the bathroom counter. Works great with two toothbrushes. It's attractive and the removable ceramic holder is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: LinGo

customer_reviews.title: Just a Great Product
customer_reviews.text: So much more sturdy and well made than I anticipated for the price. You can tell so much care was taken with packing the product, as little clear bumpers are attached to the metal vine design to keep it from rubbing against the tan inner part. Not at all flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel R

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two for my bathroom. Very pleased with the make. It's a nice size too - larger than my older ones. Very please with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had a bottom.
customer_reviews.text: This cute, but I REALLY wish it had a bottom to hold the tissue box inside when you pick it up. Kind of annoying :/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive style
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It is beautiful and blends well with my other colors in our master bath.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: very cute
customer_reviews.text: This was very cute and matched my bathroom decor perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I bought one of these my son broke the first one .. beautiful ..I love the look it gives to my bathroom sink
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: these dispensers are not only handsome they work great, after purchasing one for my bathroom I decided ...
customer_reviews.text: these dispensers are not only handsome they work great , after purchasing one for my bathroom I decided to purchase 2 more for all three and one for my kitchen sink. what more can I say.
customer_reviews.author: blueberry

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat this $$$
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice product for the $$. I ended up replacing the actual plastic cover underneath and now you would think it cost a fortune. Considering the matching trash can!
customer_reviews.author: Jaymie R

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This tissue box holder hides an ugly cardboard tissue container very well. Perfect for my bedroom nightstand
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Bronze toothbrush holder
customer_reviews.text: Matches the Hunter light/fan, Shower curtain hooks and the soap dish from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I Will recommand it
customer_reviews.text: I am so proud of it. It looks so fancy and completly changed my bathroom. Just the right size not too big not too small. You can disassemble it and use the two parts for different purposes.
customer_reviews.author: laureayina

customer_reviews.title: Needed something to go with my brown and burgundy bathroom ...
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to go with my brown and burgundy bathroom. First time i ordered USPS broke my package so had to re order at no cost came the next day :) Looks cute & fits in perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Chic
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a while and found this soap dish, instantly I know it will be better than the one I have which is terribly buy due to my time line short. I will recommend anyone who has oil rub bronze hardware in their bath room to select this soap dish and add more CHIC into your bath room.
customer_reviews.author: Pai Nam Cheung

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap dish and the matching toothbrush holder.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toothpaste hole to narrow
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is the toothpaste holder is to small for my tube of toothpaste to go in. We use the regular size tube but hole not wide enough. Overall it’s a good match for my bathroom decor and I still use it to hold my toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like it, it matches the hardware in my home. The pump is made good so I think it will last a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Nikkie

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but has design flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and easy to clean but deducting two stars because one toothbrush hole is smaller than the other and most standard toothbrushes won't fit in the smaller opening. Maybe a defect on this one unit but something to consider.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: It Holds Things
customer_reviews.text: My toothbrush hasn’t run away yet so the holder seems to be doing its job.
customer_reviews.author: Holleigh Reed

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Soap Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this soap pump to accompany the trash, cup, and tissue box that matches this design. They all came very carefully wrapped and are well-made. These accessories look beautiful in my bathroom and I would highly recommend them to anyone else looking for a interesting design to match oil rubbed bronze bath fixtures.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Webb

customer_reviews.title: Hate the insert color.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had noticed that the insert was this horrible beige color straight from the 70's. I'm using it but will be looking for replacement insert, probably in white. Wish I had sent it back or at least purchased it with the clear liner.
customer_reviews.author: Cranberry

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding item, first rate.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike at all, wonderful item, fast and friendly delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Gary John Musto

customer_reviews.title: Definately good product
customer_reviews.text: I love this tissue box cover; it is just as pretty as it looks on line..even prettier. The wire housing is true to color; the inner cover is an ecru color, a very nice contrast to the wire. It is very well made - looks great in any room. I would definately recommend this purchase to others.
customer_reviews.author: msd

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go with the set. For some reason beige cover was plastic but the tumbler and soap dispense were porcelain. It came stained. The metal is not attached to this. The look from afar is nice, but cheap if you really look close or move it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Wish this drained
customer_reviews.text: The issue I have with this is that the soap/sponge holder has a solid glass bottom. The underside of the soap/sponge doesn't get to air dry, and it makes the holder kind of nasty. It's also too shallow to really hold my nonscratch dish cleaning pad/sponge in place very well. While this is pretty, it isn't all that functional.
customer_reviews.author: Nanner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and exactly as pictured. Holds soap well and perfect for my bathroom sink.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Jernigan

customer_reviews.title: pump broke within a month
customer_reviews.text: I love love love the design of this product. I have several of the twig products in my bathroom (tissue holder and toilet paper holder). The pump worked great for about a moth and then the top broke right off. I was able to purchase a clear pump at Target that fits in the twig holder. I'm still able to use it, but there was an added expense I wasn't expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bathroom decor!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this toothbrush holder. First, it is great functionally. It fits three toothbrushes, most likely more but I have only ever tried three, as well as a full tube of toothpaste. It also does not get icky looking like other holders I have had which seem to collect a white chalky residue on them. Additionally, the center, ceramic part of it pops out easily for cleaning. Second, the look is great and is the perfect addition to any rustic themed bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Y.

customer_reviews.title: ... is attractive I wouldn't say it is the most sturdy construction. The nozzle spout comes out every time ...
customer_reviews.text: While it is attractive I wouldn't say it is the most sturdy construction. The nozzle spout comes out every time you push the soap dispenser too hard, spewing out soap every time it happens. Fell on the floor and broke, so now we will replace with something else.
customer_reviews.author: CChang

customer_reviews.title: I really like the look of the dispenser and I'm happy it ...
customer_reviews.text: I changed my review to 4 stars because of the timely response I received regarding the missing pump. I really like the look of the dispenser and I'm happy it was addressed so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Beldyga

customer_reviews.title: Trash can/waste basket not toothbrush holder
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as a toothbrush holder. But it's a larger wastebasket/trashcan. At first I thought I must have accidentally ordered the wrong item but even the plastic wrap packaging said toothbrush holder.
customer_reviews.author: Rus

customer_reviews.title: Cute but little
customer_reviews.text: This product is very cute. Looks great in my bathroom. My only complaint is that it’s a little small. If it was a little wider and taller it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice soap dispenser. I've had 2 for about 6 months and haven't had any clogging problems, etc. Very pretty without being too ornate as I'm normally prefer understated items but needed bronze to match my bathrooms. Love these and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It fits just right into the décor of the room
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was sturdy and  nicely made..I would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my powder room .. I felt it was very well-made.
customer_reviews.author: MARY ANN SCHNITZKI

customer_reviews.title: nozzle broken after barely a month's use
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed I bought this soap dispenser. I have had it for just over a month (purchased it mid-may!) and the nozzle has pulled apart. And apparently I cannot return or exchange it because I am just past the 30 day return policy. It looks really pretty but don't waste your money. Now I'm regretting not purchasing one from a box store where I'd be more likely to get it exchanged or returned because it's defective/broken so quickly. But now I'm stuck with a broken soap dispenser. What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer from Long Beach

customer_reviews.title: Well made and looks classy!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tooth brush holder, goes great with my new bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Schellhaas

customer_reviews.title: Love the metal outside
customer_reviews.text: Love the metal outside. Wish the plastic interior was nicer. I may try to do something with it like spray paint or cover. The plastic looks cheap. But the metal cover is well made and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: The nozzle came off after a month of use
customer_reviews.text: The nozzle came off after a month of use, poor quality, the metal case is good, use it as a pen holder now, i use a $1 soap dispenser from christmas tree shop, this was an expensive purchase for a soap dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: joel243

customer_reviews.title: The outside matches the other pieces I ordered But the ...
customer_reviews.text: The outside matches the other pieces I ordered But the soap dispenser quickly gave out (low use) and gushed soap all over. Prepare to purchase a new dispenser if you pass the return date.
customer_reviews.author: E. Albertson

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: This was a very smart buy for me. It is clean looking and dresses up the bathroom. The pump on it is great and I hope it last a long time because they do stop working more often then not. Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Twigz soap pump
customer_reviews.text: It's very pretty soap pump, the outside is very well made. the bottle is made of ceramic. It looks much better in person Like with my other pieces I am going to use it during the months of September thru November because of the season changing it just perfect for change.
customer_reviews.author: Love my life

customer_reviews.title: The color and design are beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it was cracked when I received it or not and it is so fragile I will not be getting another one. The color and design are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: cjc

customer_reviews.title: The toothebrush slots does not fit thicker brushes such as ...
customer_reviews.text: The toothebrush slots does not fit thicker brushes such as Oral B toothebrushes. I do not refer to electronic ones but regular brushes, as a result I bought some thin bodied colgate brushes that fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan D West

customer_reviews.title: It's aesthetically pleasing but it's smaller than it looks, ...
customer_reviews.text: It's aesthetically pleasing but it's smaller than it looks, I just got a new toothbrush with a wider handle and it doesn't fit in the toothbrush slot! The toothpaste is also a tight fit. Overall OK.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea W.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and Practical
customer_reviews.text: I keep this dispenser pump next to my kitchen sink to store my dish soap. It's lovely to look at and so easy to use. Such an improvement than keeping my dish soap in its original container!
customer_reviews.author: Ahava Goldwater

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful toothbrush holder
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful toothbrush holder. It goes beautifully in my bathroom. It is really easy to keep clean. It also isn't really big so it doesn't take up a lot of counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Active Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get a lot of use so I don't know how long it'll hold up but it's perfect for what I needed it for and so far ...
customer_reviews.text: Its just what I was looking for! Cute and simple for the guest bathroom. Doesn't get a lot of use so I don't know how long it'll hold up but it's perfect for what I needed it for and so far it's still in great shape!
customer_reviews.author: Clmills19

customer_reviews.title: Great toothbrush holder
customer_reviews.text: I love this design. I have the matching shower caddy and soap dispenser too. Looks great in the bathroom. Some other reviews complained about the holes being too small, but I haven't had that problem at all. Two standard sized toothbrushes and one standard size tube of toothpaste fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Baumgardner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the wire on the outside of it - it prevents breaking when falling.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Dufault

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty toothbrush holder. I like it a lot but feel it’s a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: K. Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Does look nice in bathroom if u don't need to keep ur ...
customer_reviews.text: Modern toothpaste and thicker modern toothbrushes do not fit. One toothbrush side fits but other is smaller so it doesnt. Does look nice in bathroom if u don't need to keep ur toothpaste and toothbrushes in it
customer_reviews.author: RRose

customer_reviews.title: Nice, attractive yet subtle
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, actually a little bigger than pictured or expected. Pictures seem to look a bit smaller than it really is. Lots of capacity, pump works well, nice quality (pump is plastic but painted a nice matte bronze).
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, well made. My only concern is that the toothpaste holder section is just barely too small and sometimes when u lift the tootpaste up the holder comes with it if u don't hold it down. But the great look of it easily outweighs that minor inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: MJhammer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dispenser. Bought with the sponge holder and the design and color looks great with the granite in my kitchen. The pump works well and so far doesn't stick others I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: momof2monkeys by

customer_reviews.title: It can slip around
customer_reviews.text: This is larger than I thought and as a result, the little balls at the bottom want to slip and slide on my small bathroom sink counter. It is pretty, but I wish it was smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great toothbrush holder!
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved and needed a new toothbrush holder - this fit the bill and looks great in the bathroom. I'm considering buying the rest of the collection to match.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Ruth

customer_reviews.title: This looked cute but when I got it, the ...
customer_reviews.text: This looked cute but when I got it, the nozzle was not attached. I thought that was how it was supposed to come in the packaging so I just stuck it back in but now it keeps popping off all the time when I pump for soap. I didn't discover this until it was too late to return or request a refund. Cheap and not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

product_meta.title: iDesign Twigz Ceramic Toothbrush Holder Stand for Bathroom, Vanity Countertops in Master, Guest, and Kids' Bathrooms, 3.7" x 3.7" x 4.1", Vanilla and Bronze
product_meta.description: Color:Toothbrush HolderThe iDesign Twigz Toothbrush Stand is a clean, traditional design that complements all styles. Made of ceramic with a wire caddy, this toothbrush holder is rust-resistant to provide years of quality use. The holder itself is made of ceramic with a vanilla-white finish. The wire caddy has a bronze finish has an elegant leaf and twig design that is perfect for any decor. This holder is equipped with 3 slots for toothbrushes - one larger and two smaller slots - so the entire family has their own section! The compact size of the holder allows it fit in small spaces besides your sink. The iDesign Twigz Toothbrush Stand measures 3. 7" x 3. 7" x 4. 1", perfect for your countertop. With iDesign by InterDesign, you can #LiveSimply every day.
feature_bullets: TOOTHBRUSH STAND: Freestanding ceramic toothbrush holder perfect for master bathrooms, guest bathrooms, and kids' bathrooms
STYLISH: Vanilla-white finish and bronze wire with a twig and leaf design provides a beautiful contrast and matches any decor
DURABLE: Made of durable ceramic for years of quality use
FUNCTIONAL: Features 3 slots for multiple toothbrushes to accommodate the entire family
COMPACT SIZE: Toothbrush holder measures 3. 7" x 3. 7" x 4. 1", perfect for small spaces
